item.title: Zendaya and Law Roach Join Forces on New On Sneaker: Shop Their Co-Designed Release Online
item.description: Zendaya’s collaboration with Swiss sportswear brand On just took a step past brand ambassadorship –and directly into product design. As part of the new “Be Every You” campaign, unveiled Thursday
